bio: A butterfly Yo-kai who makes those he Inspirits cut ties with their best friends. Often mistaken for Enerfly.

soultimate.name: Enemy Aura
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 70% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' speed is greatly decreased for a time.

name: Enefly
